p: The findings of this study can be recognized as the first detection of the bioactive components, antioxidant and antibacterial activities of turmeric grown in Ethiopia. The study on the turmeric varieties revealed that Dame variety exhibits prominent antioxidant and antibacterial activities followed by Bonga 51/71 variety. The other finding of this study is that curlone, ar-turmerone and α-Turmerone are the major components of the EOs. In vitro test on antibacterial activities of turmeric EOs and methanol extract confirmed that S. aureus is the susceptible bacterium to the extracts among the three bacterial strains. In conclusion, this research provided useful information on the functional and therapeutic potential of turmeric varieties grown in Ethiopia.
